block.comment:
This task is about preparing the implementation of requirements within a change request. Here QA measures focus on ensuring traces lead from requirements to other artifacts (e.g., bugs, reviews, issues etc.). The purpose of having traceability between requirements and change requests in this task is to support understanding which requirements are implemented together or have been subject to earlier implementation iterations.

For this task, your goal is to ensure the trace between requirements and change requests. The previous engineer has marked the task as complete (c.f., post conditions are fulfilled) but did not manage to fulfill the QA constraints. Your task is to find and execute the most suitable repair of the QA violations.
Based on the input CR, Impact Analysis and System Architecture, create/update the requirements from the baseline.
RequirementCollection as a whole is set to agreed

block.field: Are all requirements individually set to 'ReadyForReview'?
self.out_SWRequirementsColl->forAll( reqCollection | reqCollection.childItems-> select( child | child.externalType='Requirement') ->forAll(req | req.state='ReadyForReview'))
Ensure that any requirements set that is subject to open review findings is not in state 'Verified'

self.in_Review ->forAll(rev | everytime( rev.childItems ->select(child | child.externalType='ReviewFinding') ->exists(finding : <root/types/azure/Reviewfinding> | (finding.findingcategory='major' or finding.findingcategory='minor') and finding.state='Open') , eventually(self.in_SWRequirementsColl ->forAll(reqColl | reqColl.state<>'Verified') ) ))

self.in_Review ->forAll(rev | everytime( rev.childItems ->select(child | child.externalType='ReviewFinding') ->exists(finding : <root/types/azure/Reviewfinding> | (finding.findingcategory='major' or finding.findingcategory='minor') and finding.state='Open') , eventually(rev.state='Rework')) and until( not(rev.state='Closed') , rev.childItems->forAll(finding2 | finding2.state='Resolved')) )

self.in_Review ->forAll(rev | everytime( rev.childItems ->select(finding : <root/types/azure/Reviewfinding> | finding.findingcategory='major') ->forAll(majorFinding | majorFinding.state='Resolved') , eventually(rev.state='Rereview')) and until( not(eventually(rev.state='Closed')) , rev.childItems->forAll(finding2 | finding2.state='Resolved')) )
